directions: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan. Add cauliflower, reduce heat to medium-low, place a cover on saucepan, and cook cauliflower until tender, about 10 minutes; drain. Set cauliflower aside to cool for about 5 minutes; transfer to a blender.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir onion and garlic in hot oil until tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Set aside to cool for about 5 minutes; add to blender.
Pour yogurt into blender with cauliflower and onion mixture; blend until smooth. Season with parsley and garlic and herb seasoning to serve.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon garlic and herb seasoning blend (such as Mrs. Dash®), or to taste (optional)
title: (I Can't Believe It's) Mashed Cauliflower
